U

UID - Class in net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.util
A utility class which generates Unique IDentifiers for use by the StateManager when anonymous States are added.

update() - Method in class net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.Animation
Steps the animation if the amount of milliseconds since last update has exceeded the specified delay.
